name: Slap The Dead
description:
In Slap the Dead you will do exactly what you think. Slap ghosts! This is a Virtual Reality game where you are a beautiful Modern Paladin going through an old castle hotel from the 1920s, exorcizing ghosts with your bare hands. Follow the upbeat rhythm and work your way through these old halls to save this castle from the ghosts.
